name: AnimeFacts
0:
”Alexa ask anime facts for an anime fact”
”Alexa Open Anime Facts”
”Give me an anime fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anime facts
des: This skill will provide a random anime fact every time it is invoked. Ask for "an anime fact" and the skill will retrieve one.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
